Name: GET_CUSTOM_SAVE_DATA_INT
Description: Returns the value of a saved byte, short, or int made by Custom Save Data Framework.

Parameters.Name: modId
Parameters.Description: ID of a mod as seen in its ModConfig.json.

Parameters.Name: key
Parameters.Description: Key of a saved value as defined by the mod passed to modId.

Name: GET_CUSTOM_SAVE_DATA_FLOAT
Description: Returns the value of a saved byte, short, or int made by Custom Save Data Framework.

Parameters.Name: modId
Parameters.Description: ID of a mod as seen in its ModConfig.json.

Parameters.Name: key
Parameters.Description: Key of a saved value as defined by the mod passed to modId.

Name: SET_CUSTOM_SAVE_DATA_INT
Description: Modifies a value of integral type made by Custom Save Data Framework. Returns 1 if the operation succeeded.

Parameters.Name: modId
Parameters.Description: ID of a mod as seen in its ModConfig.json.

Parameters.Name: key
Parameters.Description: Key of a saved value as defined by the mod passed to modId.

Parameters.Name: value
Parameters.Description: The new value of the field being written to.

Name: SET_CUSTOM_SAVE_DATA_FLOAT
Description: Modifies a value of floating-point type made by Custom Save Data Framework. Returns 1 if the operation succeeded.

Parameters.Name: modId
Parameters.Description: ID of a mod as seen in its ModConfig.json.

Parameters.Name: key
Parameters.Description: Key of a saved value as defined by the mod passed to modId.

Parameters.Name: value
Parameters.Description: The new value of the field being written to.

Name: SET_CUSTOM_SAVE_DATA_STRING
Description: Modifies a value of string type made by Custom Save Data Framework. Returns 1 if the operation succeeded.

Parameters.Name: modId
Parameters.Description: ID of a mod as seen in its ModConfig.json.

Parameters.Name: key
Parameters.Description: Key of a saved value as defined by the mod passed to modId.

Parameters.Name: value
Parameters.Description: The new value of the field being written to.
